160324.「扉の封印 解けた……？: The seal on the door is broken...?

160325.「ふむ。すべての像が 解放されて\n 最後の 封印が解けたようじゃな……。:
Hmm. It seems that all the statues have been
released and the last seal has been broken...

160329.「ほら見ろよ クラウン！\n やっぱり ウェスリーは生きてるじゃねぇか！？: Look, Crown, Wesley is alive after all!

160330.「さっきの 残留思念は やっぱり\n 誰かの仕組んだ ニセモノだったんだな！:
The residual thoughts I had just now were a
fake, orchestrated by someone, after all!

160332.「やっと 会えたな……。\n 本当に 心配かけさせやがって……。: We meet at last... You really made me worry...

160334.「まあ こうして 無事に会えたんだから\n いいけどな。あんまり 心配かけんなよ:
Well, it's good that we met safely like this.
Don't worry too much.

160337.「どうして 封印を解いちゃうんだよ！！: Why would you break the seal!

160338.「なんでって お前を助けるために\n 決まってるだろ……？:
Why? Because I'm trying to help you, of
course...?

160339.「また 隠れ場所を探さなきゃ……\n あいつに 見つかる前に！:
I have to find a place to hide again... before
he finds me!

160342.「遺跡に入り込んでいた\n 侵入者には 逃げられてしまったか……。:
The intruder who had entered the ruins has
escaped...

160344.「いや。湖の 赤い光が 消えたものでね。\n もしやと思い 来てみたが……。\n:
No. The red light at the lake disappeared. I thought it might be a possibility, so I came here... As I thought, it seems that the
intruder's seal has been broken.

160345.「諸君。すこし 下がっていてくれたまえ……。: Gentlemen. Please stand back a little...

160347.「オレたちが せっかく 封印を解いたのに。\n また封印しちゃうんだ？:
We've already broken the seal. You're going to
seal it again?

160348.「ここは 開け放しておくには\n 少々 危険が過ぎる所でね……。: It's a little too dangerous to leave it open.

160349.「いずれにせよ 君たちに依頼していた\n 遺跡探索は これにて完了だ。:
In any case, the search for the ruins that I
have requested of you is now complete.

160350.「みんな よくやってくれた。\n 状況を説明するために ひとまず\n 場所を 対:
Well done, everyone. Let's move to the
Strategy Room for now to explain the
situation.

160354.「よーし 出やがったな！ \n ウェスリーが 待ってるかもしれねェんだ。\n さ:
Well, there you go! Wesley might be waiting
for you. Get the hell out of here!

160357.<if_woman>「……では 始めましょう\n フランジュさん <pc>さん。: <if_woman>...So let's begin, Mr. Frange <pc>.<else>...So let's begin, Mr. Frange <pc>.<endif>

160361.「これで あなたたちと全力で戦えるわ。:
Now I can fight you guys with everything I've
got.

160365.「願いのチカラを狙う 例の勢力から\n 学園を守るため 招かれた エージェント同:
Both agents were invited to protect the school
from the power of wishes. The headmaster had
high hopes for them, but...

160366.「私たちときたら ライバル心 むきだしで\n ぶつかりあってばかりで\n 最初の:
We were always clashing with each other with
our Rai val hearts exposed, and in the
beginning it was all about failure.

160368.「おたがい オモテ向きの 仕事でしか\n なかったはずの 生徒指導に 熱が入りす:
The part where we both get so involved in student-teaching that we forget about our duties, which were only supposed to be a
public service...

160369.「いざとなると 向こう見ずに\n 敵に 飛びかかっていく ところとか。\n なん:
The way he would leap at his enemies without looking over his shoulder when the situation called for it. We were similar in some way,
weren't we?

160370.「それが わかってからは 一気に打ち解けて。\n 教師としても エージェントとし:
Once we realized that, we instantly became
friends. As a teacher and as an agent... we've
come to really trust each other.

160371.「でも…… そんな ふたりの関係も\n 長くは 続かなかった……。: But... their relationship did not last long...

160372.「あの日 あなたは\n 明らかに 様子がおかしかった……。: You were clearly acting strange that day...

160373.「はげしい痛みに さいなまれているかのように\n 苦しみだしたかと思うと…… か:
I thought he was in agony, as if he was in
great pain... then he suddenly swung his
beloved axe at me as I ran over to him.

160374.「暴風のような斬撃を かわしながら\n 必死に 説得を試みたけれど\n あなたの:
I tried desperately to convince you, dodging
the slashes like a storm, but you didn't seem
to hear me.

160375.「血走った目に宿る 殺気は 本物だった。\n やらなければ やられる……\n 私:
The murderous intent in his bloodshot eyes was
real. If I didn't do it, I would be beaten...
my warrior instincts told me so...

160376.「混乱し 心は乱れていても 鍛えあげた\n 戦闘の技術は 私を 裏切らなかったわ:
Confused and distracted in mind, my well-honed
combat skills did not fail me. I dodged a
slash on the spur of the moment, and I...

160377.「……このローゼンニードルで あなたを刺した。: I stabbed you with this Rosen Needle.

160379.「それからの私は あえて\n はげしい戦いの中に 身を置くことで\n あの日のこ:
From then on, I tried desperately to forget
that day by putting myself in the middle of
the fiercest battles.

160380.「でも……剣を握るたびに あの時の感触が\n よみがえってきて……。\n もう:
But... every time I hold the sword, the
feeling of that time comes back to me... I
can't stand it anymore...

160381.「私は 罪の意識から逃れるように……\n この子を 湖の底に沈めた。:
I drowned this child at the bottom of the lake
to escape my guilt.

160382.「そして あなたの愛弟子が\n 入学してもなお すべてを隠して\n 自分の罪から:
And even after your beloved student enrolled,
you continued to hide everything and turn a
blind eye to your own sins.

160383.「でも……そんなことで 苦しみは消えなかった。: But... that didn't make the pain go away.

160384.「だからね ザビアナ。\n 私は もう 自分の罪から逃げずに\n 自分のしたこと:
So, Zaviana, I will no longer run away from my
sins, but will face what I have done.

160385.「たとえ どんな結果が 待っていようとも……。: No matter what the outcome may be...

179867.「よし 片付いたな。: Okay, that's all taken care of.

179868.「これで ウェスリーに 剣を渡してやれるな。: Now we can give Wesley the sword.
